contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 2nd day of November, 1988, the “Application for Order Modifying the October 16,1987, Opinion of the Pennsylvania Supreme Court” is denied.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 2nd day of November, 1988, the “Application for Order Modifying and/or Enforcing the Opinion Per Curiam of the Pennsylvania Supreme Court dated October 16, 1987” is denied.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
